ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese

gear.name: popcorn maker or pot with lid

cookingTips: Mix butter and sesame oil while still warm and drizzle gradually over popcorn while tossing to avoid sogginess
Add grated Parmesan while the popcorn is still warm so it adheres; use finely grated for even coating
Toss with salt and pepper last to prevent the seasonings from clumping in the oil
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a gourmet snack. Do you want tips on how to get an even coat of oil and cheese without making it soggy?
